channel.title: RuneSharp, C# Project
channel.description:
I have started a new project from nothing.
[b]First a little bit about the server.[/b]
It will be coded in C#. It will be 100% my coding, except references off google. And some packet references from Silabs tutorials, and out of winterloves original release. It will be a clean source.
[b]Structure of the server,[/b]
Based around the Server.cs class. Server.cs will run handlers, will start the Client Handler upon running. And all other handlers.
Not sure how to handle the packets. Might make a packet handler like the RSCD server? Need ideas about this though.
[b]Expectations of the server,[/b]
I just want to make a basic server. With combat, skill, item, and npc handling. Just so people have a good base to make there own server.
[b]Development,[/b]
I have only just started developing the server, and have only just about finished the Server class.
I will not have a development team, other then a few close friends or people i know can code to the standerds i want this server. (If you can code please post)
[b]Hosting,[/b]
I will never host the server from my computer. Except for testing, and beta testers. I will however host my own website, and maybe host my own forums from my computer.
[b]Final, [/b]
Once i have the server to my expectations it will be realsed for all to run there own C# based server.
I will update this post with my updates. Ask any questions and i will be happy to reply asap.
And if you can offer to host me a website and fourms i would be greatfull.
Thanks for reading. If you support please make sure you post.
[b]- Grungy (Teh Sam).[/b]
[b]Contact Information - [/b] Sambo1992@hotmail.co.uk (Will only accept your adds if you have posted a question or somthing else on this related to the server)[br][size=1]Posted on: July 01, 2007, 08:52:20 AM[/size][hr][b]Updates Page,[/b]
1/7/2007 - Got the Server.cs Class finished. (does nothing currently, havent made any handlers yet.)

item.title: RuneSharp, C# Project
item.dc:creator: @grungy grungy
item.description:
@grungy wrote:

I have started a new project from nothing.

First a little bit about the server.

It will be coded in C#.
It will be 100% my coding, except references off google. And some packet references from Silabs tutorials, and out of winterloves original release.
It will be a clean source.

Structure of the server,

Based around the Server.cs class.
Server.cs will run handlers, will start the Client Handler upon running. And all other handlers.

Not sure how to handle the packets. Might make a packet handler like the RSCD server? Need ideas about this though.

Expectations of the server,

I just want to make a basic server. With combat, skill, item, and npc handling. Just so people have a good base to make there own server.

Development,

I have only just started developing the server, and have only just about finished the Server class.

I will not have a development team, other then a few close friends or people i know can code to the standerds i want this server. (If you can code please post)

Hosting,

I will never host the server from my computer. Except for testing, and beta testers.
I will however host my own website, and maybe host my own forums from my computer.

Final,

Once i have the server to my expectations it will be realsed for all to run there own C# based server.

I will update this post with my updates.
Ask any questions and i will be happy to reply asap.

And if you can offer to host me a website and fourms i would be greatfull.

Thanks for reading. If you support please make sure you post.

- Grungy (Teh Sam).
